table.name: IAMUser
table.description: User is a person who uses Zoho Apps within an Account. A person can use Zoho Apps via different Accounts. A "User" represents the person for a single Account only and the same person can have different users in different Accounts. Lifecycle of a user in one Account will not affect the users of that person in other Accounts

column.name: ZUID
column.description: Unique ID of the user across Zoho

column.name: USER_STATUS
column.description: Current status of the user Active - 1, Inactive - 0, Closed - 2

column.name: USER_ROLE
column.description: User Role member - 0, Admin - 1

column.name: USER_TYPE
column.description: Type of the user. Ex: Employer, Contracter, Visitor etc

column.name: GENDER
column.description: M - Male, F - Female, O - Non binary, N - Not selected

column.name: DATE_OF_JOINING
column.description: The data at which this user has joined to this organization

column.name: IDP
column.description: type of idps ZOHO(0), ORG_LDAP(1), GOOGLE(2), YAHOO(3), AOL(4), LIVE(5), SITE_MINDER(6), GAPPS(7) and FACEBOOK(8)

column.name: AUTH_TYPE
column.description: Identifies the authentication type. The value may be ZOHO, PORTAL etc. If ZOHO, the password validation will be done against the default ZOHO account. If portal, the it will happen against the portal. User can specify the AUTH_TYPE which can be overriden here. If the allows only the PORTAL authentication then the user setting will not be taken care.

table.name: IAMUserInfo
table.description: User's information, new columns to the user table can be added here.

table.name: IAMUserLocation
table.description: User verus Location association

column.name: LOCATION_AUTO_ID
column.description: Unique ID of the work location of the user

table.name: IAMUserScreenName
table.description: Unique, human readable, identifier for a user within an Account.

column.name: IS_LOGIN_NAME
column.description: Non ZUID services will reserve space using this row if it is set to true

column.name: IS_ZOHO_EMAIL_ID
column.description: Identifies the email address provided by Zoho. Should be unique with UserName field for backward compatability.

table.name: IAMUserMobileScreenName
table.description: Unique, mobile number for a user within an Account.

table.name: IAMUserEmail
table.description: Email address of a user. Ownership will be verified while adding an Email. Used for Account Recovery, Authentication and account related notifications

column.name: IS_VERIFIED
column.description: Will be set to true only if the given verification code is correct

column.name: IS_PRIMARY
column.description: Identifies the primary email address

column.name: VERIFICATION_CODE
column.description: Internal attribute generated by the system while adding the mobile. Will not be exposed to the services.

table.name: IAMUserPassword
table.description: Password used to authenticate the user

table.name: IAMUserAppPassword
table.description: Password used to authenticate the user

column.name: PASSWORD_ID
column.description: Unique ID of the user app password

column.name: IP_ADDRESS
column.description: The IP Address of the user at the time of this password is generated.

column.name: USER_AGENT
column.description: Using which browser or devide the access has been made.

column.name: IP_AUDIT_INFO
column.description: iplocation info will be stored as JSON object.

table.name: IAMUserSecurityQA
table.description: Security question and answers to be used during Account recovery

table.name: IAMUserSecretKey
table.description: Password used to authenticate the user

column.name: IS_VERIFIED
column.description: Will be set to true only if the given code is correct

column.name: IS_PRIMARY
column.description: Will be set to true only if the given code is correct

column.name: KEY_TYPE
column.description: To differentiate between oneauth and Google authenticator(0)

table.name: IAMUserPreference
table.description: User preference across Zoho Apps

column.name: NOTIFY_ME_BY
column.description: 0-MAIL and 1-SMS

table.name: IAMUserAddress
table.description: Residential address of the user

column.name: ADDRESS_TYPE
column.description: 1 - Work (2^0), 2 - Residential current(2^1), 4 - Residential permanent(2^2)

table.name: IAMUserProps
table.description: User properties used by Zoho Apps. This is like an extension to the "account/user/preference" resource

table.name: IAMUserTrustedDomain
table.description: List of domains that are trusted by the user in order to pass basic user attributes

column.name: IP_ADDRESS
column.description: The IP Address of the user at the time of this domain is trusted.

column.name: USER_AGENT
column.description: Using which browser or devide the access has been made.

column.name: IP_AUDIT_INFO
column.description: iplocation info will be stored as JSON object.

table.name: IAMUserMobile
table.description: Mobile number of the user. Used for Account Recovery, Authentication and account related notifications

column.name: IS_VERIFIED
column.description: Will be set to true only if the given verification code is correct

column.name: VERIFICATION_CODE
column.description: Internal attribute generated by the system while adding the mobile. Will not be exposed to the services.

table.name: IAMUserDevice
table.description: Device Token of the user. Used for Account Recovery, Authentication and account related notifications

column.name: DEVICE_TYPE
column.description: Will be set to 0 for iOS and 1 for Android

column.name: DEVICE_OS_VERSION
column.description: Current OS Version of the User Device

column.name: DEVICE_INFO
column.description: Other info related to user device,for future use.

column.name: SETUP_MODE
column.description: mode is 0 by default which means user has signed in and yet to confirm a mfa mode in device.

column.name: IS_PRIMARY
column.description: Will be set to true for the primary device.

column.name: IS_VERIFIED
column.description: Will be set to true only if the Account SetUp is correct

column.name: IS_LOCKED
column.description: Will be set to true only if the App is locked from the device.

column.name: PUBLIC_KEY
column.description: Public Key associated with User. Used for Encrypting the msgs for Security.

column.name: LOCATION
column.description: Location of the device.

column.name: REFRESH_TOKEN
column.description: Mapped Access token for this device.

column.name: APP_VERSION
column.description: App version

column.name: MODE
column.description: mode is 0 by default which means it is none 0-RECOVERY, 1-TFA, 2-MFA,3-PASSWORDLESS,4-PASSWORDLESS_WITH_BIOMETRIC

column.name: PREF_OPTION
column.description: prefrence option 0 which means no mode is set.

column.name: BIO_TYPE
column.description: 0-NoBIO , 1-TouchID, 2-FaceID , Type of bio associated to the pref_option column.For e.g., push notification with FACE-ID

table.name: IAMUserSigninPreference
table.description: User preference across Zoho Apps

column.name: DEFAULT_PREFERENCE
column.description: 0- password, 1-device

table.name: IAMUserTPSecretGroup
table.description: To group ThirdPartySecretKeys

column.name: GROUP_ID
column.description: Unique Group Id

column.name: GROUP_NAME
column.description: Group name

column.name: GROUP_DETAILS
column.description: To maintain customized data

column.name: NEXT_ID
column.description: To maintain the order of the Group

table.name: IAMUserThirdPartySecretKeys
table.description: Pass prase for My zoho app recovery

column.name: APP_ID
column.description: Unique App Secret Id

column.name: APP_NAME
column.description: Third party app name

column.name: LABEL
column.description: email/ user name for the app

column.name: APP_SECRET
column.description: Third party app secret

column.name: DURATIONS
column.description: Third party secret duration

column.name: APP_DETAILS
column.description: To maintain customized data

column.name: APP_LOGO
column.description: To maintain LOGO of the App 0 - No Logo 1 - Customized logo loaded in ZFS 2 - Facebook logo, 3 ....

column.name: NEXT_ID
column.description: To maintain the order of the App Secret

table.name: IAMAccountAuthUserOpenID
table.description: OpenId which is provided by the IDP, such as, Google, Yahoo, and the ZUID/Email association. Applications can perform GET and DELETE only. PUT and POST are triggered systematically during OpenID login

column.name: OPEN_ID_APL
column.description: Unique ID from the OpenID provider

column.name: OPEN_ID
column.description: Unique ID from the OpenID provider

column.name: EMAIL_ID
column.description: Email address associated with the OpenID

column.name: USER_AGENT
column.description: Using which browser or devide the access has been made.

column.name: IP_AUDIT_INFO
column.description: iplocation info will be stored as JSON object.

table.name: IAMUserPwdHistory
table.description: To track the old passwords of a user so that repeating the same password on forced password change can be aovided.

column.name: PASSWORD
column.description: Previously used password

column.name: SALT
column.description: The SALT used to digest the password

table.name: IAMUserAuthorizedIP
table.description: IP addresses from which this user account can be accessed. Defined by the user.

column.name: IPID
column.description: For IAM BC added. Unique representation of ip range.

column.name: FROM_IP
column.description: From IP Address of the range.

column.name: TO_IP
column.description: To IP Address of the range. In case of single IP Address, this column will be null.

column.name: USER_AGENT
column.description: Using which browser or devide the access has been made.

column.name: IP_AUDIT_INFO
column.description: iplocation info will be stored as JSON object.

table.name: IAMAccountTag
table.description: Various resources under an Account can be tagged for search purpose

column.name: TAG_TYPE
column.description: Can be used for categorizing the Tags ex: Skills, Sports, Interests etc

table.name: IAMAccountTagItem
table.description: Association of a Tag with related resources

column.name: RESOURCE_ID
column.description: The unique ID of the resource. If a user is tagger then ZUID will be here, for a group ZGID etc

column.name: RESOURCE_TYPE
column.description: The Type of the resource. The Proto Name of the Resource. "User" for a user "Group" for a group etc

column.name: RESOURCE_URL
column.description: URL of the resource for easy fetching purpose. It is a nullable column.

table.name: IAMCustomFields
table.description: In addition to the default user attributes available in the "Account/User" resource, Account specific additional user attributes are defined here. The value of this attribute is stored in "UserCustomField" entity.

column.name: CUSTOM_FIELD_ID
column.description: Some unique ID for the field either generated by cs OR set by the services. Can be used as the input field name

table.name: IAMUserCustomField
table.description: User specific value of the custom fields defined in "Account/User/CustomField" resource.

table.name: IAMUserRecoveryCode
table.description: Generate Backup Codes for TFA Recovery.

table.name: IAMUserSystemProperties
table.description: User properties internally used by Zoho accounts.

column.name: IP_INFO
column.description: iplocation info will be stored as JSON object.

table.name: IAMUserServiceDetails
table.description: User servce status and details like first accessed time are stored here.

column.name: APP_ID
column.description: Unique ID for service from App table.

column.name: DEFAULT_APP_ACCOUNT
column.description: Default app account zaaid

table.name: IAMUserVerificationCode
table.description: Stores verification code sent during signin for TFA authentication.

table.name: IAMUserAccountsProperties
table.description: User properties internally used by Zoho accounts.

table.name: IAMOAuthAccessGrant
table.description: User granting access to third party apps to use an AuthToken on behalf of him/her.

column.name: IP_ADDRESS
column.description: The IP Address of the user at the time of this access grant.

column.name: USER_AGENT
column.description: Using which browser or devide the access has been made.

column.name: CREATED_TIME
column.description: The time at which the token is generated

table.name: IAMOAuthAccessGrantScopes
table.description: This table will contain default/allowed scopes for the particular project.

column.name: SCOPE_ID
column.description: ID of the scope required. Will have from App.SCOPE_ID

table.name: IAMUserWhiteListedClient
table.description: This table will contain whether client is whitelisted to access from any ip

column.name: IS_WHITELISTED
column.description: Ip whitelisting restriction while using client 0 - not whitelisted, 1 - whitelisted, 2 - restricted

table.name: IAMUserOAuthApps
table.description: User granting access to third party apps to use an AuthToken on behalf of him/her.

column.name: IP_ADDRESS
column.description: The IP Address of the user at the time of this access grant.

column.name: CREATED_TIME
column.description: The time at which the token is generated

table.name: IAMOAuthAllowedClients
table.description: User Oauth Clients allowed access for restricted clients case

column.name: CREATED_TIME
column.description: The time at which the token is generated

table.name: IAMUserGDPRDetails
table.description: User Associated GDPR Details

table.name: IAMUserServicePreference
table.description: User servce status and details like first accessed time are stored here.

column.name: PREFERENCE_KEY
column.description: Unique ID for service from App table.

column.name: PREFERENCE_VALUE
column.description: Default app account zaaid

table.name: IAMUserSigninLocation
table.description: User signin trusted location details

column.name: LOCATION_AUTO_ID
column.description: Unique ID of the location of the user

table.name: IAMUserSigninUserAgent
table.description: User signin trusted user_agent details

column.name: LOCATION_AUTO_ID
column.description: Unique ID of the work location of the user

column.name: USER_AGENT_ID
column.description: Unique ID of user_agent of the user

table.name: IAMUserExtendedInfo
table.description: User Oauth Clients allowed access for restricted clients case

column.name: MANAGER_ZUID
column.description: Reporting To users ZUID. Will be refered from IAMUser. Optional.

column.name: DESIGNATION_ID
column.description: DESIGNATON_ID of the user. Will refer from IAMDesignations

column.name: LOCKED_UNTIL
column.description: The duration until which the account is blocked after multiple failed sign in attempts

table.name: IAMUserMailFetchLocation
table.description: User Mail fetch trusted location details

column.name: LOCATION_ID
column.description: Unique ID of mail fetch location

table.name: IAMYubikeyRegistrationData
table.description: Registration Data of users using Yubikey as TFA

column.name: TRANSPORTS
column.description: Supported connection type of yubikey(ex: usb,nfc,ble,internal stored as 0,1,2,3)

table.name: IAMOneAuthPreference
table.description: OneAuth Prefrence data of users

column.name: PRIVATE_KEY
column.description: Encrypted private key of the user passphrase

column.name: PUBLIC_KEY
column.description: Public key of the user passphrase

column.name: SECRET_KEY
column.description: Shared secret key for TP Secret encryption

column.name: PASS_PHRASE
column.description: encrypted pass phrase for OneAuth app recovery

column.name: RESTRICT_SIGNIN
column.description: Used to restrict signin

column.name: TP_SECRET_SYNC
column.description: Used to Sync Third Party Secret

column.name: ENC_PROVIDER
column.description: Provider used in encrypt TP Secret and Passphrase's private key

table.name: IAMUserAppKeyStore
table.description: Holds public key of user
